title: Digital lending in India witnesses big transformation, thanks to two specific borrower groups
description: According to Redseer Strategy Consultants, digital lending is projected to account for 5% of all retail loans by FY28, up from 1.8% in FY22 and approximately 2.5% in FY24. This growth is expected to follow a compounded annual growth rate of 40%.
